DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Medical Imaging Tracer Uptake 3 Cellular Compartment Analysis Calculation Constant Calculation Rate Constant Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to express the calculated rate constant measurement obtained in a 3-compartment model for an imaging tracer uptake, specifically for the transport from a tissue non-metabolized compartment to a metabolized state.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Medical Imaging Tracer Uptake Integer::3 Cellular Compartment Analysis Calculation Constant
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._Any technology which helps in visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for the screening, diagnosis, surgical procedure or therapy._An easily detectable molecule attached to a usually larger molecule._The absorption by a tissue of some substance, food material, mineral, etc., and its permanent or temporary retention._A number with no fractional part.::3_Cell partitioning techniques used to determine the subcellular distribution of molecules of interest._The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods._Continually recurring or continuing without interruption.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.:In medicine, any technology which helps in visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for the screening, diagnosis, surgical procedure or therapy.:An easily detectable molecule attached to a usually larger molecule.:The absorption by a tissue of some substance, food material, mineral, etc., and its permanent or temporary retention.

Concepts.definition: An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function.
In medicine, any technology which helps in visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for the screening, diagnosis, surgical procedure or therapy.

A substance that is identifiable by virtue of its radioactive signature, color, or other distinguishing physical property, such as a dye, radioactive isotope, or inert chemical, that is introduced into a biological or mechanical system and can be followed through the course of a process, providing information on the pattern of events in the process or on the redistribution of the parts, elements, or events involved.
The absorption by a tissue of some substance, food material, mineral, etc., and its permanent or temporary retention.

Property.preferredName: Integer::3 Cellular Compartment Analysis Calculation Constant
Property.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::3:Cell partitioning techniques used to determine the subcellular distribution of molecules of interest.:The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.:Continually recurring or continuing without interruption.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Cell partitioning techniques used to determine the subcellular distribution of molecules of interest.
The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.
Continually recurring or continuing without interruption.
